author: Greg Morago
title: Houston barbecue team scores at 2015 Jack Daniel's World Championship Invitational Barbecue
text:
Houston barbecue team scores at 2015 Jack Daniel's World Championship Invitational Barbecue By Greg Morago Published 2:04 pm, Sunday, October 25, 2015 Photo: Mayra Beltran, Houston Chronicle Image 1 of / 16 Close Image 1 of 16 "Across the Track Cook-Off Team" is awarded the Grand Champion Overall winner for the 2015 Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo World's Champion Bar-B-Que Cookoff and representative Kerry Fellows receives the award on Saturday, Feb. 28, 2015, in Houston. "Across the Track Cook-Off Team" is awarded the Grand Champion Overall winner for the 2015 Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo World's Champion Bar-B-Que Cookoff and representative Kerry Fellows receives the award ... more Image 2 of 16 Teammates Kerry Fellows and Doug Scheidlng carry the trophy awarded to Across the Track Cook-Off Team for the 2015 Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo World's Champion Bar-B-Que Cookoff Grand Champion Overall on Saturday, Feb. 28, 2015, in Houston. Teammates Kerry Fellows and Doug Scheidlng carry the trophy awarded to Across the Track Cook-Off Team for the 2015 Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo World's Champion Bar-B-Que Cookoff Grand Champion Overall on ... more Image 3 of 16 Kerry Fellows carries the trophy awarded to Across the Track Cook-Off Team for the 2015 Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo World's Champion Bar-B-Que Cookoff Grand Champion Overall winner on Saturday, Feb. 28, 2015, in Houston. Kerry Fellows carries the trophy awarded to Across the Track Cook-Off Team for the 2015 Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo World's Champion Bar-B-Que Cookoff Grand Champion Overall winner on Saturday, Feb. 28, ... more Image 4 of 16 Kerry Fellows carries the trophy awarded to Across the Track Cook-Off Team for the 2015 Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo World's Champion Bar-B-Que Cookoff Grand Champion Overall while congratulated by Harry Miller on Saturday, Feb. 28, 2015, in Houston. Photo: Jack Daniel's Houston barbecue team scores at 2015 Jack Daniel's World Championship Invitational Barbecue 1 / 16 Back to Gallery 
Houston's Across the Track Cook-off Team , the barbecue crew that won overall grand champion at this year's World Championship Bar-B-Que Contest, took the Cook's Choice award at the 27th Annual Jack Daniel's World Championship Invitational Barbecue in Lynchburg, Tenn., on Oct. 24. 
The team that bested all others t the Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo barbecue cook-off , had an automatic invitation to Jack Daniel's as a result of winning at the Rodeo. Across the Track was among 68 championship teams from across the country and 26 international teams competing for Grand Champion at the Jack. 
Cool Smoke of Richmond, Va., was named Grand Champion, marking the team's second win at the Jack. Cool Smoke, led by pitmaster Tuffy Stone, no stranger to the Houston Rodeo cook-off, was also named grand champion at the Jack in 2013. On The Menu
